name: typescript-react-express-app
description: Full-stack TypeScript application with React and Express

scripts.start:win: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --handle-input "npm run server" "cd client && set PORT=3000 && set HOST=127.0.0.1 && npm start"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd client && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules
